svcproc.title: DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para: Low battery voltage may cause incorrect fault codes while performing diagnostic procedures for the Electronically controlled International® engines. To prevent this condition from occurring, the vehicle batteries should ALWAYS BE IN A FULLY CHARGED STATE before any diagnostic procedures are performed.

step1.para: Check to see that batteries are fully charged. Refer to Service Manual Section CTS-5021K in Group 08 of the Master Service Manual.
If the batteries are not found to be fully charged, they must be charged or replaced before initiating any diagnostic testing.
File a copy of this bulletin in EGES-125 and EGES-145 engine diagnostic manuals.
